attributes.action: Give energy customers the opt out of pay the green levy
attributes.additional_details: To reduce bills for those in fuel poverty they should have the chance to opt out of the green levy. Anyone who does not subscribe to the con of green policies, which has provided no co2 reductions at all, should not be charged for this levy. Supporters of green energy should continue to pay it. Additionally a lot of the time there is no green energy to every house so why pay for something you are not receiving.
